RelatedSentence: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov urged the Organisation for Security and Co-operation in Europe ( OSCE ) to use urgently all possibilities of this organisation to release Russian journalists from LifeNews TV channel in Ukraine , the Russian Foreign Ministry said on Monday .

Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov urged the Organisation for Security and Co-operation in Europe ( OSCE ) to use urgently all possibilities of this organisation to release Russian journalists from LifeNews TV channel in Ukraine , the Russian Foreign Ministry said on Monday .

A1: Russia 's Minister of Foreign Affairs Sergei Lavrov
RelatedSentence: In connection with the detention of LifeNews reporters by Ukrainian servicemen in Kramatorsk May 18 , Russia 's Minister of Foreign Affairs Sergei Lavrov got in touch with OSCE Chairman-in-Office and President of Switzerland Didier Burkhalter and urged him to promptly use all the possibilities of this organization for the immediate release of the Russian journalists , the Foreign Ministry reported .

A0: Russia 's Minister of Foreign Affairs Sergei Lavrov
RelatedSentence: In connection with the detention of LifeNews reporters by Ukrainian servicemen in Kramatorsk May 18 , Russia 's Minister of Foreign Affairs Sergei Lavrov got in touch with OSCE Chairman-in-Office and President of Switzerland Didier Burkhalter and urged him to promptly use all the possibilities of this organization for the immediate release of the Russian journalists , the Foreign Ministry reported .

In connection with the detention of LifeNews reporters by Ukrainian servicemen in Kramatorsk May 18 , Russia 's Minister of Foreign Affairs Sergei Lavrov got in touch with OSCE Chairman-in-Office and President of Switzerland Didier Burkhalter and urged him to promptly use all the possibilities of this organization for the immediate release of the Russian journalists , the Foreign Ministry reported .
OSCE Chairman has assured that he will immediately go into this question , the Foreign Ministry added .
Similar demarches were also made before the leadership of OSCE Secretariat in Vienna and the OSCE mission headquarters in Kiev , Ukraine , the Russian ministry reported .
The Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs will be seeking the soonest settling of the situation around the Russian journalists , the diplomatic service said .
